name: SPYDIVE
description:
Play as a secret agent as she freefalls to make her escape! Avoid obstacles as you fall through the air, and blast any enemies who follow you!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Mouse to aim.

Left mouse to shoot.

Art by conceptkid.

(Note: There is no volume slider, so make sure your speakers/headphones aren't turned too high before starting. Sorry, we're new to this!)
